title: Help: Managing a Help Article
body:
Help: Managing a Help Article¶

Help is a compilation of all the help articles that have been added to the Maha Platform.
An article can belong to a specific app and have accompanying videos. These features will be displayed along with the title and publish status (marked by a or ).

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Help

  4. Click on a help article to view details, video links, article, and comments

  5. If available, click watch video to view the accompanying videos

  6. Click and Edit Help Article to edit the article

  7. Click and Publish Article to publish the article

  8. Click and Unpublish Article to unpublish the article

    • Alternatively, you can select the desired article(s) by clicking to the left of the row and clicking Publish Selected or Unpublish Selected

    • You can mass select all the articles by clicking in the upper left hand corner
